topics.body: What is the difference between heresy and blasphemy?
topics.author: 50b70eeb7f123b1a02000097

topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body:

topics.author: 50b70eeb7f123b1a02000097

topics.body:
"@Randomosaur":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53b8cf1e63687210fdd40000#post_53b8cf1e63687210fdd40000

heresy: belief that goes against your own

blasphemy: trash talking your beliefs.
topics.author: 5154c5237f123bcd580002fc

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53b8d47463687210abf70200#post_53b8d47463687210abf70200
They always are when they're young. So full of energy and curiosity.

"@Randomosaur":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53b8cf1e63687210fdd40000#post_53b8cf1e63687210fdd40000
Heresy is beliefs that do not line up with orthodox interpretations of a given subject.

Blasphemy is an insult to something considered holy. The two are not mutually exclusive.
